meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emily Sun Gus Woythaler Niki Peters Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7231.

td.p: Emily Sun, a freshman at Columbia University from San Diego, California
Gus Woythaler, a senior at Stanford University from Encino, California
Niki Peters, a sophomore at the University of California, Berkeley originally from Boise, Idaho

tr.td: MAMA'S BOYS
COLLEGE TOWNS
DOUBLE THE VOWEL, DOUBLE THE FUN
AWARDS & HONORS
FICTION
HOME WATCHING TV
